article: Many middle school students like  watching TV  very much.But  from Monday to  Friday they must go to school.So on saturday they  _  at home and watch TV from morning to night.They don't know it's bad for their eyes.Usually children like to eat fish.meat and chicken,don't 1ike vegetables  _  fruit.They don't know that  _  more vegetables and fruits i s  _  than eating meat. At school the children only do a few minutes of sport or  _  do any sport.The students must know it isn't good for  _  health,too. We already think of ways to keep  _  .We must eat  a lot of  vegetables and fruit,do enough sport every day.And we should watch TV and read in right wavs.
